channel.title: Changing Stats
channel.description: How do I change my stats? and make myself owner? I don't have a GUI to set stuff, cause everyone's accounts are saved in a P File...I don't even know what that is! anyway this is the picture..can anyone help me? I need to make myself owner so i can spawn item ids that are over 20,000. and change my stats in character files. but I can't cause its a P File and is corrupted or something. I'm running like a 706 rsps or something like that.

item.title: Changing Stats
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Rexxy:

LOL, I couldn’t find anything on Google, so i’m going to search here. I have no idea lol.

I can vaguely remember seeing it on here somewhere, it’s in a file somewhere. Look in the 667/704 release thread, it may be in there.

Read full topic
